snippet: A judge said he would not stop the company that owns The Las Vegas Review-Journal, Stephens Media, from trying to buy out the family publishers of the rival Las Vegas Sun.
abstract: Judge James Mahan of Federal District Court in Las Vegas says it is too early in process to issue injunction blocking Stephens Media, owner of Las Vegas Review-Journal,  from offering to buy out family publishers of rival Las Vegas Sun.
lead_paragraph: A judge said he would not stop the company that owns The Las Vegas Review-Journal, Stephens Media, from trying to buy out the family publishers of the rival Las Vegas Sun.

headline.main: Judge Rules Against Injunction in Effort to Buy Newspaper
headline.print_headline: Judge Rules Against Injunction In Effort To Buy Paper
